plot: Nombre Original: Increible Shaolin ThunderkickDirector: Godfrey HoActores: Eagle Han, Siu Tien YuenIncredible Shaolin Thunderkick: A drunken beggar saves Hsu Jun from death and schools the lad to brutal extremes of self-denial and physical perfection. Then the old master reveals the ultimate weapon: the Shaolin Thunderkick. Now Hsu Jun can battle the White Eyed Tiger Gang!
title: Increible Shaolin Thunderkick
